item.title: The American Spectator : AmSpecBlog : Palin Cheap-Shots a Good Reporter
item.description: Palin Cheap-Shots a Good Reporter http://t.co/I8nF33v :: AmSpecBlog
item.content:encoded: Palin Cheap-Shots a Good Reporter http://t.co/I8nF33v :: AmSpecBlog The press corps has a mild buzz going about a weekend contretemps ginned up, for publicity sake, by Sarah Palin's camp, in her ongoing campaign to show how badly she is victimized by the media. The odd thing is that she has been victimized by the media, horribly so, and many of us (myself included, in several posts after the Gabby Giffords shooting) have rushed to her defense -- so she doesn't need to gin up congtroversies out of thin air. But that's exactly what she and her team did this past weekend. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: spectator.org

item.title: Obama to automakers: ‘You can’t just make money on SUVs and trucks’ - The Hill's E2-Wire

item.content:encoded: Obama to automakers: ‘You can’t just make money on SUVs and trucks’ http://t.co/ToKOWHr The country’s automakers should ditch their heavy focus on SUVs and trucks in favor of smaller, more fuel-efficient vehicles, President Obama said Monday. You can’t just make money on SUVs and trucks,” Obama said during a town hall forum in Cannon Falls, Minn. Link - Trackbacks

item.title: A Photo Upload API | Twitter Developers
item.description: Applications can now upload pictures with tweets. Get started with the new statuses/update_with_media method: http://t.co/f6Av2Il ^TS
item.content:encoded: Applications can now upload pictures with tweets. Get started with the new statuses/update_with_media method: http://t.co/f6Av2Il ^TS Photos are a fundamental way that people share context, information, jokes, and personal moments on Twitter. Following last week’s wider release of photos to Twitter.com users, we’re ready to share our media upload API, which will allow developers to conveniently attach an image to a Tweet. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: twitter.com

item.title: SXSW 2012 - Let's Talk Video for Social Change
item.description: It's #SXSW voting time again - Let's Talk Video for Social Change http://t.co/KJe003n I #DT @invisiblepeople
item.content:encoded: It's #SXSW voting time again - Let's Talk Video for Social Change http://t.co/KJe003n I #DT @invisiblepeople Description There is no denying the power of moving pictures to tell a story. In fact, you have probably taken in one or more forms of video media already today. Sure, I may be biased, but videos are the most powerful way to transmit emotion. If you can transmit emotion while telling a good story you will no doubt increase response. The challenge for every business, organization, and nonprofit or for-profit company is that the world of video production is like the Wild Wild West. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: sxsw.com
